computedFields.name: IsOverdue
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('IsClosed' == "false") && (daysBetween(toDate(substr('ActivityDate', 1, 10), "yyyy-MM-dd"), now()) > 0) then "true" else "false" end
computedFields.label: IsOverdue

computedFields.name: DaysOverdue
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'IsOverdue' == "true" then daysBetween(toDate(substr('ActivityDate', 1, 10), "yyyy-MM-dd"), now()) else 0 end
computedFields.label: Days Overdue

computedFields.name: UniqueUserName
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when isDuplicate is null then 'Name' else 'Name' + " (" +'Username'+ ")" end

computedFields.name: Duration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'ValidToDate' == "3000-01-01T00:00:00.000Z" then     date_diff("second",toDate(ValidFromDate_sec_epoch), now())     else     date_diff("second",toDate(ValidFromDate_sec_epoch), toDate(ValidToDate_sec_epoch))     end
computedFields.label: Duration

computedFields.name: IsClosed
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when daysBetween(toDate(ActivityDate_sec_epoch), now()) >= 0 then "true" else "false" end
computedFields.label: IsClosed

computedFields.name: hasOpportunity
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Opportunity_Name' is null then "false" else "true" end

computedFields.name: CustomFilter
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Opportunity_Name' is null && 'IsActive' == "false" then "false" else "true" end

computedFields.name: UserOrQueueName
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Owner_Name' is null && !('Queue_Name' is null) then 'Queue_Name' when !('Owner_Name' is null) then 'Owner_Name' else "N/A" end
computedFields.label: Owner or Queue Name

computedFields.name: OwnerType
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Owner_Name' is null && !('Queue_Name' is null) then "Queue" when !('Owner_Name' is null) then "User" else "N/A" end
computedFields.label: Owner Type

computedFields.name: LeadAge
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('IsConverted' == "false") then daysBetween(toDate(CreatedDate_sec_epoch), now())  else daysBetween(toDate(ConvertedDate_day_epoch), toDate(CreatedDate_day_epoch))  end
computedFields.label: Lead Age in Days

computedFields.name: OpportunityAge
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('ConvertedOpportunity_Name' is null) then 0 when ('ConvertedOpportunity_IsClosed' == "false") then ('CurrentDate_sec_epoch' - 'CreatedDate_sec_epoch')/86400  else ('ConvertedOpportunity_CloseDate_sec_epoch' - 'CreatedDate_sec_epoch')/86400 end
computedFields.label: Total Opportunity Age

computedFields.name: hasOpportunity
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Opportunity_Name' is null then "false" else "true" end

computedFields.name: OpenClosedWonLost
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'IsWon' == "true" then "Closed Won" when 'IsLost' == "Yes" then "Lost" when 'IsClosed' == "false" then "Open" else "NA" end

computedFields.name: OpportunityScore
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'OpptyScore_Score' == 0 or 'OpptyScore_Score' is null then 'Opportunity_Score_Dummy__c' else 'OpptyScore_Score' end
computedFields.label: Opportunity Score

computedFields.name: Neglected
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when DaysSinceLastActivity >= 60 && 'IsClosed' == "false" then "true" else "false" end
computedFields.label: Neglected

computedFields.name: DaysSinceLastActivity
computedFields.saqlExpression: case    when LastActivityDate is null      then daysBetween(toDate(LastModifiedDate_sec_epoch), now())   when LastModifiedDate > LastActivityDate     then daysBetween(toDate(LastModifiedDate_sec_epoch), now())   else daysBetween(toDate(LastActivityDate_sec_epoch), now()) end
computedFields.label: Days Since Last Activity

computedFields.name: OpportunityAge
computedFields.saqlExpression: case    when IsClosed == "false"     then daysBetween(toDate(CreatedDate_sec_epoch), now())     else daysBetween(toDate(CreatedDate_sec_epoch),toDate(CloseDate_sec_epoch))     end
computedFields.label: Opportunity Age

computedFields.name: DaysPastDue
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when IsClosed == "false" && (toDate(CloseDate_sec_epoch) < now()) then daysBetween(toDate(CloseDate_sec_epoch), now()) else 0 end
computedFields.label: Days Past Due

computedFields.name: IsPastDue
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when IsClosed == "false" && (toDate(CloseDate_sec_epoch) < now()) then "true" else "false" end
computedFields.label: Past Due

name: Sales_Analytics_5_0
description: Dataflow for the Sales Analytics Application.
